item.title: Cleaning lady (Level 4)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Apprentice Seamstress (Level 3)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Apprentice Archivist (Level 1)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Master Context Seeker (Level 9)
item.description: Checked repo status with git status

item.title: Master Product Manager (Level 7)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Apprentice Merchant (Level 2)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Apprentice Cathedral Worker (Level 1)
item.description: Cloned submodule repository and checked out commits specified by superproject.

item.title: Apprentice Chimney Sweeper (Level 3)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 8)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Banker (Level 6)
item.description: Join two or more development histories together with git merge.

item.title: Goldsmith (Level 6)
item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.

item.title: Apprentice Investigator (Level 2)
item.description: Used git blame to annotates a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Butcher (Level 5)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Apprentice Web Designer (Level 1)
item.description: Instantly browse your working repository in gitweb with git instaweb

item.title: Master Socialite (Level 7)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Apprentice Amalgamator (Level 3)
item.description: Merge conflicted file with git mergetool.

item.title: Blacksmith (Level 4)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Product Manager (Level 6)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Master Vanity Check (Level 7)
item.description: Checked your achievements using git achievement

item.title: Vanity Check (Level 6)
item.description: Checked your achievements using git achievement
